attributes.title: Kinda sad
attributes.review: I really thought it would be a good app and I was so excited to support the orange man. It keeps making my phone crash and it’s really sucky 😔 I’m afraid it also has fake news and will make the people who trust it stupid. Sad to see apps fail :(( it should  definitely get taken off  I thought it was gonna work ✨😠💨

attributes.title: Bad Overall
attributes.review: Even though I do not support Donald Trump at all I wanted to download the app to have more information on what he is doing. The app simply didn’t have anything going for it. It has poor marketing and it is a terrible and childish way to advertise a campaign. Also Trump deserves to be taken out of office immediately.

attributes.title: WORST ALL KNOWN TO EXISTS
attributes.review: why would you make an app about a racist, homophobic, xenophobic, rapist, ugly ~orange~ . not only is he ugly, but his coo chile STANK . i won’t support a president who says he would date his daughter 👁👄👁 . and all u dumb trump supporters ALWAYS justify his actions. all he cares about is white supremacy, he even retweeted about white power. and you blind supports wanna justify that 😳 . ANYWAYS stan Bernie for clear skin and if not go choke ✨

attributes.title: Fellow orangutan
attributes.review: This app is heinous. It took forever to download and don’t even get me started on how it promised me that my dog would start talking if I downloaded it. So I did. Worst mistake ever! If I could I would give this app a 0 out of 5 stars. Now before all the round tangerines come download the app, don’t! Lana Rhodes won’t show up alright ! It’s a scam! Ridiculous.  🍊🧚🏼‍♂️💫✨💞🌈

attributes.title: doesn’t work😔 (long live gen z✨)
attributes.review: I tried to open the app and it would not even let me. The app just kept CRASHING. Oh how I longed to support stupid boy don, however the app made it hard to do so. I just wish there was a way to delete the app, so people don’t have to go through the hassle and trouble I did. This app needs to go. DONT GET THIS APP GUYS, WASTE OF TIME AND SPACE.

attributes.title: Ewwww
attributes.review: I am absolutely discussed with this app , I downloaded it to try and get information on our president and as soon as I downloaded it spiders and  roaches started coming out of my walls so of course I deleted the app immediately and they all went away so in conclusion don’t download this app unless u want roaches and spiders running around ur house

attributes.title: WTH
attributes.review: So I go on the app and read this y’all need help🤬 “Yea I only watch it in January but I watched it yesterday on July fourth eating watermelon flavored chicken nuggets that was actually lemonade but spongbob said I should go to sleep but I was watching Pluto kill miny for dating his man Micky but other than that it was a good show sadly Patrick killed sandy last week which was actually tomorrow lol how was your day.”

attributes.title: Will u help 👉👈🥺
attributes.review:
Horrible app. Absolutely terrible. Constantly crashing, I always get notifications that I don’t want like “grab em by the pu**y”, and “PRESENTATIONAL HARASSMENT”
I don’t know if this app is even worth downloading, maybe it’s the Chinese or Russians trying to hack into our systems and control our minds. Don’t waste your time with this app, unless you’re tryna ✨help out from TikTok✨

attributes.title: Worst app in history
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping for Ryan Secrest to pop up because that’s what i was promised when i did. but automatically from opening this app i got into a car wreck and had broken my hand. i am now blind and non functioning anymore. disgusting and the worst thing ever in my life. my dog also got aten by a roach.

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020
attributes.review: Trump is one of the best presidents we have had in a long time and I love this app is has helped me so much keeping up with everything!!!❤️🤍💙🇺🇸🇺🇸
